The Obama administration: s request for additional funding to address the increasing number of children at the border.
Homeland Security Secretary Jeh Johnson: s refusal to confirm whether most of the unaccompanied minors would be deported.
Labrador: s claim that the Obama administration predicts an increase in the number of children at the border to 150,000 to 200,000 next year.
The source of Labrador: s claim, a May 2014 internal memo from Deputy Border Patrol Chief Ronald Vitiello, which stated that 90,000 minors would be apprehended this year and 142,000 next year.
